flows.name: JM - UR - NEW U-Report Opt In

actions.text: You already joined U-Report. Invite friends to join by sharing the following link with them, which when tapped opens a new chat with U-Report in WhatsApp.
Tap this link and send us the word JOIN to join U-Report http://wa.me/18768384897?text=JOIN

groups.name: Active Contacts  (Not in a U-Partner case)

actions.text: Wah Gwan. U-Report is a tool to give 1000s of Jamaican youth a voice. First tell us how old you are. Reply with your age as a number.
Sorry that age is not recognized. Please respond with a number only e.g. if eighteen years old reply, 18
Sorry. The minimum age to join U-Report is 13. Please join when you are 13.
Thanks. Now, please tell us your gender. Reply male, female or non-binary.
Sorry that gender is not recognized. Please respond with male, female or non-binary.

arguments: other trans transwoman transman transmale transfemale non-binary

actions.text: Bless Up. We are almost done. What PARISH are you from. Reply with parish name only, like ST ANDREW or HANOVER.
Sorry, we did not understand your answer. Reply with your PARISH name only e.g. ST ANDREW or HANOVER.
Big up yuhself U-Reporter. You are now part of a global YOUth movement. If you ever want to leave, message us the word QUIT

Hi, how can U-Report help you today? Reply
A to chat with a U-Matter counsellor
B to try our newest activity
C to get parenting tips
D to visit our website
E to contact us

Great, how we can help? Msg us and a team member will reply ASAP. For organisations wanting to partner with U-Report, pls give your name and contact info also.

flows.name: JM - UR - Chatline Welcome No Screening

actions.text:
Hi. You're chatting with U-Matter, a confidential service to support young Jamaicans, by the Ministry of Health and Wellness and UNICEF's U-Report.

To chat with a counsellor, reply YES or NO
Sorry but we didn't understand that. Please reply YES or NO
That's OK. You can come back anytime by sending us the word SUPPORT
Before connecting you with a counsellor for the first time, we just need to ask a few quick questions to help us better support you.
Please tell us how old you are. Answer with your age as a number, so if you are seventeen years old you would type 17
Sorry we didn't understand that. Answer with your age as a number, so if you are seventeen years old, reply, 17
Before connecting you with a counsellor for the first time, we just need to ask a few quick questions to help us better support you.

How do you identify yourself? Reply A, B or C

A Male
B Female 
C Non-binary
Sorry but we didn't understand that. Please reply A, B or C
What PARISH do you live in. Reply with parish name only, like ST ANDREW or HANOVER.
Before connecting you with a counsellor for the first time, we just need to ask one question to help us better support you.
Sorry, we did not understand your answer. Reply with your PARISH name only e.g. ST ANDREW or HANOVER.

flow.name: JM - UR - Chatline user satisfaction survey

flows.name: JM - UR - Chatline user satisfaction survey

actions.text: Thanks for using U-Matter. We hope we improved your day. Can you answer a few quick Qs to help improve our service? Reply YES or NO
Sorry, but this survey is automated and there are only two valid options. Please reply YES or NO

router.result_name: Want to take user satisfaction poll

actions.text: Were you satisfied with us and did we meet your needs? Reply to rate us from 1 to 5. 1 is Unsatisfied and 5 is Very Satisfied. Reply 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5
That's OK.
Sorry, but this survey is automated and there are only five valid options. Please reply 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5
Rate from 1 to 5 how you felt at the START of the conversation. 1 is worse than I ever felt and 5 is best that I ever felt. Reply 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5
Sorry, but this survey is automated and there are only five valid options. Please reply 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5
Rate from 1 to 5 how you felt at the END of the conversation. 1 is worse than I ever felt and 5 is best that I ever felt. Reply 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5
Sorry, but this survey is automated and there are only five valid options. Please reply 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5
Would you contact us again? Reply YES or NO

router.result_name: Q4 result - will you contact us again

actions.text: Sorry, but this survey is automated and there are only two valid options. Please reply YES or NO
Would you recommend us to a friend? Reply YES or NO

router.result_name: Q5 result - recommend us to a friend

actions.text: Sorry, but this survey is automated and there are only two valid options. Please reply YES or NO
Last question is our suggestion box. Do you have any suggestions for us to improve our service? Reply YES or NO
Sorry, but this survey is automated and there are only two valid options. Please reply YES or NO

router.result_name: Q6 result -  want to give suggestion or not

actions.text: Great, please type your reply to write your suggestion and then press send. Thank you.
Thanks from the team at U-Matter, brought to you by U-Report and the Ministry of Health and Wellness.
